component.name: GnomeDDC
component.summary: Adjust DDC/CI monitors using a Libadwaita interface

description.p: GnomeDDC is a GNOME application for managing external monitors that expose DDC/CI capabilities through ddcutil-service. It listens for hotplug, capability, and value-changed signals to keep the UI responsive and accurate, while surfacing developer options for raw values, write verification, and sleep multipliers.
